body.name: Microwave Popcorn Popper (Red) and 100 Pieces Paper Popcorn Bags | Silicone Popcorn Maker | Collapsible Microwavable Bowl | 100 pcs Food Grade Popcorn Bags for Movie Night & Birthday Party
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 💎【EASY TO USE, QUICK & INSTANT】Just add kernels to the popcorn maker, add seasoning and put in the microwave. The most convenient popcorn poppers for home use. You can make 15 cups of delicious popcorn within a few minutes by using our durable silicone popcorn popper. Get the delicious crunchy popcorn night in an instant.

🎁【100 PCS PAPER POPCORN BAGS】100 pcs popcorn bags individual servings. The popcorn bags is about 3.54 x 2.25 x 8.27 inches which can hold 1 Oz popcorns. Food grade paper is leak-resistant and grease-resistant coat to keep your cloth clean.

👍【EASY TO CLEAN & STORE】Our microwavable and silicone popcorn maker is easy to easy to clean and easy to store. It’s also dishwasher safe. It can be easily washed by hand or in a dishwasher, ensuring perfect hygiene and cleanliness.
🍰【COLLAPBILE SPACE SAVING】 The space-saving and collapsible design can be collapsed to 2.3 inches for easy and compact storage.
🏆【100% SATISFACTION】Please feel free to drop us an email and we will refund 100% of the money if you have any problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Popcorn Popper
reviews.reviewText: After making perfect popcorn for years in a particular pan on our gas stove, I was disappointed that my new pans, designed for our new induction stove produced TOUGH popcorn. But this new popcorn popper makes large, fluffy and tender popcorn every time in our microwave We're so relieved!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The popcorn bags and maker were purchased to be an ‘under $20. Gift exchange’. The microwave popper seemed very flimsy and didn’t seem worth the price. I don’t know how it cooks since it wasn’t for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best popcorn popper and 100 popcorn bags is a plus
reviews.reviewText: 100 popcorn bags is very useful with this popcorn popper
